channel.title: Tsukuyomi Ascendant
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Tsukuyomi Ascendant" - best team

item.title: Re: Tsukuyomi Ascendant
item.content:encoded: I used Blind Fury, Miss Kitty 2 and Mr. Tea 3. I thought that I can do more if I have more stamina rather than bruteforcing it. And Wasteland allies don't go in Monochrome missions so they can't be used.

item.title: Re: Tsukuyomi Ascendant
item.content:encoded: That's good advice, thanks! That'll put me at +10 strength in Shikai and at 52 levelsâ€¦ should take about 320 stam. I can do that before I have to fight again for my moon. ^^

item.title: Re: Tsukuyomi Ascendant
item.content:encoded:
I used:

Miss Kitty Lvl2
Robo Girl Lvl2
Blind Fury

You can switch out Blind Fury for Shorty Lvl2 or Tats if you need more strength.

item.title: Tsukuyomi Ascendant
item.content:encoded:
What's the best team for the rolling challenge? Should I take allies that give +stam for special missions? Also, do wasteland allies work in this mission (for nin levels)?

Thanks!
